subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Daniel Brière and Derek Roy scored power-play goals, rallying the Sabres’ sputtering special teams in a 5-2 victory over the Washington Capitals Wednesday night in Buffalo.
snippet: Daniel Brière and Derek Roy scored power-play goals, rallying the Sabres’ sputtering special teams in a 5-2 victory over the Washington Capitals Wednesday night in Buffalo.
